# Data Source svm peer

Retrieves the configuration of SVM Peers.

## Supported Platforms
* On-perm ONTAP system 9.6 or higher
* Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP
## Example Usage

```terraform
data "netapp-ontap_svm_peers" "svm_peers" {
  cx_profile_name = "cluster4"
  filter = {
    svm = {
      name = "acc*"
    }
    peer = {
        svm = {
          name = "acc*"
        }
        cluster = {
          name = "abc-1"
        }
    }
  }
}
```
